info.title: InfrastructureInsightsManagementClient
info.description: Resource provider health operation endpoints and objects.

get.description: Returns the list of all resource provider health states.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

get.description: Returns the requested service health object.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

ServiceHealth.description: Holds information about the health of a service.

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources

ServiceHealthList.description: Pageable list of service health objects.

infraURI.description: The route prefix to the service.

ServiceHealthModel.description: Holds information about the health of a service.

criticalAlertCount.description: The number of critical alerts for the service.

warningAlertCount.description: The number of warning alerts for the service.

allOf.description: Models the base properties for health resource.

azure_auth.description: Authorization uses an Azure Active Directory OAuth2 flow.
